column4: hi all, is there an opensource project that can run on ubuntu, that does the same as gotomeeting or webex where two clients can connect to the server (ubuntu) and share desktops ?
ubuntu comes with vino, which is a VNC server for GNOME
thanks i will check that out
does vino work if it is running on ubuntu, and the two clinents that want to share their desktops are both windows machines?
